title: Germany
description:
We need to recognise addiction as the disease that it is – people who suffer from addiction need harm reduction and treatment. The sooner we support these people the smaller the negative consequences for these people. These must be evidence and human rights-based. Through harm reduction it may be possible to stabilise drug users in relation to their health, preventing them from marginalisation and stigmatisation.
